name: LA Phoenix
description:
LA Phoenix is a Charity NFT Collection comprised of 800 unique digital artworks. Utilizing the Live Encyclopedia: Large Nature Model, the project imagines via the generative AI Large Nature Model a futuristic bio-sustainable Los Angeles. Voyaging from the Hollywood Sign to Griffith Observatory, from Santa Monica Pier to DTLA, we witness the harmony and love of the diverse Angelino community, who create their own unique utopia in a climate-safe environment.

Benefits the LA Arts Community Fire Relief Fund and the Refik Anadol Studios Web3 Fund.
